recommendations.title: Fix High Severity Hydration Issues
recommendations.description: Found 1239 high severity issues that are likely causing React error #130
recommendations.action: Review and fix client-only API usage and time-sensitive rendering

recommendations.title: Widespread Client-Only API Usage
recommendations.description: Multiple files are using client-only APIs without proper guards
recommendations.action: Implement HydrationSafeWrapper or move code to useEffect

recommendations.title: Time-Sensitive Rendering
recommendations.description: Components are using time-sensitive data that differs between server and client
recommendations.action: Use consistent timestamps or format dates properly

recommendations.title: Implement Hydration Error Boundary
recommendations.description: Wrap components with HydrationErrorBoundary for better error handling
recommendations.action: Add HydrationProvider to your app root
